name: Ryan and Shandiin's Wedding Adventure
description:
An adventure of wedding proportions!

Ryan and Shandiin are excited to get married but they lost everything and can't go to the wedding! Help them as their fluffy black kitty Berlioz to find everything and save their wedding day!

Left - A or Left Arrow

Right - D or Right Arrow

Up - W or Up Arrow

Down - S or Down Arrow

Jump - Space

Run - Shift

Can work with USB NES Controller

We hope that you enjoy the game! It's a small game for guests at our wedding to enjoy during the recession that we wanted to share with you. If you decide to donate all the money will go our honeymoon.

Build 10_25_17_0 - Updated Windows version to fix game breaking bug

Mac Build 10_26_17_0 - Updated Mac version to fix a write error that prevented any gameplay.

Thanks so much for playing!
